titles.title: Providing amounts for interim expenses of the Committee on Homeland Security in the first session of the One Hundred Ninth Congress.
Providing amounts for interim expenses of the Committee on Homeland Security in the first session of the One Hundred Ninth Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Provides for the payment of interim expenses of the House Committee on Homeland Security through March 31, 2005.
